channel.title: Politics on Tatsu Online
channel.description: Recent content in Politics on Tatsu Online

item.title: The EARN IT Act
item.description: Introduction Earlier this month, United States Senators Lindsey Graham and Richard Blumenthal introduced a bill on the floor, the so-called EARN IT Act. The title of the bill is a backronym which spells out “E liminating A busive and R ampant N eglect of I nteractive T echnologies”. The purported goal of this bill is to establish a National Commission on Online Child Sexual Exploitation Prevention; however, the true goal of the Senators is to exploit the general lack of public understanding of the technology behind encryption and to eliminate its use.
